content: Ths is my first blog post. I'm so happy. I will write about Java, Spring and other cool stuff !
name: Welcome here !

content: Yeah of course you know Java ! It's a fantastic programming language that allows us to create performant application... Let me introduce you this language...
name: Do you know Java ?

content: Spring Framework is the most used framework on the Java community. It help you to build application in a good way. I will write a lot about Spring !
name: Do you know Spring ?
Spring Data JPA
content: Do you know Spring Data can help you to manage your data? There are many sub modules as Spring Data JPA or Spring Data MongoDB. Let me explain you...

name: MongoDB update
content: That's a news, MongoDB just publish a new update and there are some new cool features ! I will developp this point...

name: Spring Tool Suite
content: I know I know many developpers are using IntelIJ but I can convince you to use Spring Tool Suite for Eclipse when you are working on Spring project. Do you want to know why ? I will tell you!

name: Java Spring Conference in Paris
content: Are you living in France ? Or are you a big fan of Spring ? Then come meet me at the Java Spring Conference in Paris !

tag.name: Spring Framework
tag.description: Spring is the most Java framework used on the world.
